Function reference

version 0.5.0

All functions

generate_dependence

Generate pleiotropic associations between SNPs and phenotypes.

generate_null

Generate empirical null distribution using permuted data.

generate_phenos

Generate phenotypic data with prespecified block-wise correlation structure.

generate_snps

Generate SNP data with prespecified spatial correlation structure.

HS locus

locus_horseshoe

Fit a sparse multivariate regression model using variational inference.

locus-package

locus: a package for combined predictor and outcome selection in high-dimensional set-ups using variational inference

locus

Fit sparse multivariate regression models using variational inference.

replicate_real_phenos

Generate phenotypes emulating real phenotypic data at hand.

replicate_real_snps

Generate SNPs emulating real SNP data at hand.

set_blocks

Gather settings for parallel inference on partitioned predictor space.

set_cv

Gather settings for the cross-validation procedure used in <code>locus</code>.

set_hyper

Gather model hyperparameters provided by the user.

set_init

Gather initial variational parameters provided by the user.
